title: Stolen account
body: I recently made a post about having my account stolen, http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/4TTB4Flk-stolen-account, and was told to send in a ticket and wait a little bit. That hasn't worked and now I am worried about my account as I've spent a fair amount of money on it. I was wondering if any riot member could reassure me that this issue is being taken care of.

replies.body:
Sadly it seems Riot will not do anything about stolen/hacked accounts. They'll just tell you it's in their "Terms of use" that you're responsible for your account details.

I'm a victim myself, and there are others in the forum with the same problem, none of which Riot has "given a shit" about.
Also it seems like the account has not been deactivated as there are games taking place just a couple hours ago. http://quickfind.kassad.in/profile/oce/thetomguy/
